sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>soul</radical> is like the <radical>ground</radical> or the <radical>dawn</radical>. It is <kanji>constant</kanji>, never changing.
meaningInfo: Think of some other things your soul is like, but always make sure you come back to one word: constant.
readingMnemonic: Also <kanji>constant</kanji> is the Emperor <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja>, who will surely rule for a thousand more years!
readingInfo: A constant rule from Emperor <ja>こういち</ja> means constant kanji learning and constant WaniKani reviews. They will always be constant!
